name: Mvmnt - Demo
description:
Mvmnt is a 2d platformer based arcade/fighting game meant to be installed as a app on your desktop. The game is in development still and may get upates in the future. This game was specifically made to be something you could play when you didnt have any other games to play and just wanted to relax. Mvmnt is controller compatible but has to be played through a custom script created for Ds4 windows. I will leave the link to the script in a seperate link. For instructions on how to connect and download everything to be able to get the full experience of Mvmnt, click this link and follow the tutorial.
